name: Thrown(X)
description: Can be thrown up to X spaces

name: Holdout
description: ADV on checks to hide the weapon on your body

name: Impact
description: You deal +1 damage on Heavy Hits

name: Bonk
description: You have +1 to hit against creatures wearing Heavy Armor

name: Versatile
description: When wielded two-handed, add +1 to hit

name: Loading(X)
description: You must spend X AP to to reload this weapon before you can attack with it again
